attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP 🤢🤮
attributes.review: it took several hours to download and when it finally did it wasn’t working and kept glitching, absolutely disappointed. i just wanted to support our “great” president 🤢🧚‍♀️✨

attributes.title: Don’t get it
attributes.review: The app took weeks to download and it wasn’t even worth my time to wait for it. 10/10 do not recommend getting at all!!!

attributes.title: Horrible App
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app it forced me to give unnecessary information about my race. Do NOT trust this app. As soon as I finished downloading the app, a swarm of termites ate away at the wooden skeleton of my house and now I am homeless.

attributes.title: My opinion
attributes.review: This app was very laggy, it also crashed multiple times...I feel it could bring a virus onto your phone!

attributes.title: Highly disturbing 🤢
attributes.review: Trump is the worst president in the world! He said he will make the world great aging but are you serious like really Karen why would u make this app 🤦🏾‍♀️ and do you reall want your president to be a orange 🍊 NO! So instead or “Trump 2020” how about “Kanye west 2020!”

attributes.title: slow😤
attributes.review: this is the WORST app I have ever got it took to long to download and was super slow everything on it is bad too I will never get this again

attributes.title: this app almost killed me 😡😡
attributes.review: this dumb orange🍊his app sent me into space right when i opened it🪐luckily i used my magic powers to grab onto uranus and fling myself back to earth🌏i ended up landing right on the great wall of china and when i climbed down i fell into a hole that made me pop out of the great barrier reef🌊at least i could ride my pet dolphin back to america even though i really don’t wanna be here🐬

attributes.title: The worst app available
attributes.review: This app made my phone freeze up and I have gotten multiple viruses everytime I open the app. Don’t get this app it will destroy your phone.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: This is the worst app ever pls do not download it made my phone glitch so bad I had to repair it and take the risk of getting Covid-19 this app is the worst it also somehow deleted the rest of my apps and it’s frustrating

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!
attributes.review: This is the worst app I’ve every had. Please do not get it if you’re happy with how you’re living. It’ll take your car insurance away and leave you with hundreds of cockroaches in your bed!
